business_structure.proprietorship: Simple, personal tax rates (up to 30% + surcharge)

startup_benefits.section_80iac: 100% tax exemption for 3 out of 10 years (if DPIIT recognized)

international_sales.export_of_services: Zero-rated (0% GST) if recipient is outside India
international_sales.documentation: Export invoice with LUT (Letter of Undertaking)
international_sales.forex_compliance: Report to RBI if exceeds USD 25,000/year

pricing_strategy.domestic: Price + 18% GST (e.g., INR 749 + INR 135 = INR 884 total)
